template.name: Template Net Arista SNMPv2
template.description: Template Net Arista version: 0.15 MIBs used: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB ENTITY-SENSORS-MIB ENTITY-STATE-MIB ENTITY-MIB

item_prototype.name: {#DEVICE_DESCR}: Загрузка процессора
item_prototype.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB The average, over the last minute, of the percentage of time that this processor was not idle. Implementations may approximate this one minute smoothing period if necessary.

discovery_rule.name: Memory Discovery
discovery_rule.description: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB::hrStorage discovery with memory filter and description 'RAM'. Do not discover RAM(Buffers) or RAM(Cache)

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Memory units
item_prototype.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB The size, in bytes, of the data objects allocated from this pool. If this entry is monitoring sectors, blocks, buffers, or packets, for example, this number will commonly be greater than one. Otherwise this number will typically be one.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Used memory in units
item_prototype.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB The amount of the storage represented by this entry that is allocated, in units of hrStorageAllocationUnits.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Total memory in units
item_prototype.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB The size of the storage represented by this entry, in units of hrStorageAllocationUnits. This object is writable to allow remote configuration of the size of the storage area in those cases where such an operation makes sense and is possible on the underlying system. For example, the amount of main memory allocated to a buffer pool might be modified or the amount of disk space allocated to virtual memory might be modified.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Used memory
item_prototype.description: Used memory in Bytes

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Total memory
item_prototype.description: Total memory in Bytes

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Memory utilization
item_prototype.description: Memory utilization in %

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE}: Storage units
item_prototype.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB The size, in bytes, of the data objects allocated from this pool. If this entry is monitoring sectors, blocks, buffers, or packets, for example, this number will commonly be greater than one. Otherwise this number will typically be one.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE}: Used storage in units
item_prototype.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB The amount of the storage represented by this entry that is allocated, in units of hrStorageAllocationUnits.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE}: Total space in units
item_prototype.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB The size of the storage represented by this entry, in units of hrStorageAllocationUnits. This object is writable to allow remote configuration of the size of the storage area in those cases where such an operation makes sense and is possible on the underlying system. For example, the amount of main storage allocated to a buffer pool might be modified or the amount of disk space allocated to virtual storage might be modified.

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE}: Used space
item_prototype.description: Used storage in Bytes

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE}: Total space
item_prototype.description: Total space in Bytes

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE}: Storage utilization
item_prototype.description: Storage utilization in % for {#SNMPVALUE}

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Температура
item_prototype.description: MIB: ENTITY-SENSORS-MIB The most recent measurement obtained by the agent for this sensor. To correctly interpret the value of this object, the associated entPhySensorType, entPhySensorScale, and entPhySensorPrecision objects must also be examined.

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Temperature status
item_prototype.description: MIB: ENTITY-SENSORS-MIB The operational status of the sensor {#SENSOR_INFO}

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Температура выше нормы: >{$TEMP_WARN:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Температура очень высокая: >{$TEMP_CRIT:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Скорость вращения вентилятора
item_prototype.description: MIB: ENTITY-SENSORS-MIB The most recent measurement obtained by the agent for this sensor. To correctly interpret the value of this object, the associated entPhySensorType, entPhySensorScale, and entPhySensorPrecision objects must also be examined.

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Статус вентилятора
item_prototype.description: MIB: ENTITY-SENSORS-MIB The operational status of the sensor {#SENSOR_INFO}

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: Модель
item_prototype.description: MIB: ENTITY-MIB

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: Серийный номер
item_prototype.description: MIB: ENTITY-MIB

trigger_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: Возможно замена устройства (получен новый серийный номер)
trigger_prototype.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Изменился серийный номер устройства. Подтвердите и закройте.

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: Статус блока питания
item_prototype.description: MIB: ENTITY-STATE-MIB
